CustomField.formula: IF(DAY(Data_da_demonstracao__c) < 10, "0" & TEXT(DAY(Data_da_demonstracao__c)), TEXT(DAY(Data_da_demonstracao__c))) & "/" & IF(MONTH(Data_da_demonstracao__c) < 10, "0" & TEXT(MONTH(Data_da_demonstracao__c)), TEXT(MONTH(Data_da_demonstracao__c))) & "/" & TEXT(YEAR(Data_da_demonstracao__c))
CustomField.label: Data demo
